Summary: shaped like a curling rock, apox. 20ft. in dia,and apox.7ft high, lights inside
divs: Sighting DetailsAs my wife walked out to check the cattle, she noticed this object hovering about 3ft. above the ground, she came in shouting to get me & our hired man,we got out the door to see this object,which was about 10 ft. away, hovering above ground,we stood there looking at it for about1 min.this object took off, very fast,leaving no sound& no exhaust,after a few sec, we could see a flare behind it, I asume it was from the friction in the athmosphere.there were windows all around it, above the center, we could see the ligt inside, but no faces,the center ring appeared to be about 5" wide & went all around the object,looked like smoked glass,so I asume thata person inside ,could see out, but we could not see in. I honestly believe this object came from outer space,My 2 witnesses can verify this staement
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were no other sightings in Edmonton on or around April 28th 1971
